title: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model PassengerQueue
description: Property. Information about the Passenger Party Queue. A line of people waiting to pass through the security checkpoint process.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to PassengerQueue.

Identifier.description: Property. Unique identifier for the Passenger Queue. The identifier should be unique within an Airport.

Name.description: Property. Name of the Passenger Queue. The name should be unique within an Airport.

CheckpointFacility.description: Property. Information about a Checkpoint in an Airport used to provide services. A Checkpoint facility is any facility where customers and passengers turn up and need to be processed, serviced or screened before proceeding to the next stage of their journey.

Description.description: Property. Description of the Checkpoint Facility.

Identifier.description: Property. Unique identifier for the Checkpoint Facility. The identifier should be unique within an Airport.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Checkpoint Facility. The name should be unique within an Airport.

CheckpointAreaLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Checkpoint.

Latitude.description: Property. Coordinate of the latitude of the checkpoint area location.

Longitude.description: Property. Coordinate of the longitude of the checkpoint area location.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for geospatial or geopolitical location of a Checkpoint Area Location.

Srid.description: Property. A Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID), to identify the spatial coordinate system definitions

AirportElevation.description: Property. The height of an Airport, above sea level.

Name.description: Property. The name of an Airport elevation above sea level.

Value.description: Property. The value of an Airport elevation above sea level.

AirportElevationUnitOfMeasurement.description: Property. The unit of measure of the height of an Airport above sea level (FT for foot or M for metre).

Name.description: Property. The name of the unit of measure for an Airport elevation above sea level.

ZoneAreaLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Queuing Zone in a Terminal.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Zone Area Location.

TerminalAreaLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of an Airport Terminal building.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Terminal Area Location.

AirportLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of an Airport.

Latitude.description: Property. Coordinate for latitude of the Airport.

Longitude.description: Property. Coordinate for longitude of the Airport.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Airport Location.

Srid.description: Property. A Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID), to identify the spatial coordinate system definitions.

CheckpointFacilityOperatorParty.description: Property. Information that describes the Party responsible for the operation of a Checkpoint in an Airport.

Name.description: Property. Unique name of the Operator Party for the Checkpoint Facility.

CheckpointFacilityType.description: Property. Information that describes the classification for a Checkpoint in an Airport. Values are: Security Screening, Customs.

Code.description: Property. Unique code for the Checkpoint Facility Type.

Description.description: Property. Description of the Checkpoint Facility Type.

ConcourseFacility.description: Property. Information about an Airport Concourse as buildings or infrastructure used to provide services.

Identifier.description: Property. Unique identifier for the Concourse Facility.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Concourse Facility.

TerminalFacility.description: Property. Information about an Airport Terminal as buildings or infrastructure used to provide services.

Identifier.description: Property. Unique identifier for the Terminal Facility.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Terminal Facility.

AirportFacility.description: Property. Information about an Airport as buildings or infrastructure used to provide services.

IataCode.description: Property. Three character IATA code for the Airport.

IcaoCode.description: Property. Four character ICAO code for the Airport.

Name.description: Property. Common name of the Airport.

OperationTimePeriod.description: Property. The time period over which the Checkpoint is operating.

ClosingTime.description: Property. The date and time from when the Checkpoint Facility is closed. Date time should be UTC, compliant with ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2023-04-20T11:54:59Z)

OpeningTime.description: Property. The date and time from when the Checkpoint Facility is open. Date time should be UTC, compliant with ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2023-04-20T11:54:59Z)

PassengerProcess.description: Property. Information about the Passenger Party Process.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Passenger Process.

PassengerProcessType.description: Property. Information about the type of Passenger Party Process.

Code.description: Property. Unique code for the type of Passenger Party Process.

Description.description: Property. Description of the type of Passenger Party Process.

QueueLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Passenger Queue.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Queue Location.

QueueStatus.description: Property. Information about the status of a Passenger Queue. Values can be: Open, Closed.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the status of the Passenger Queue.

QueueType.description: Property. Information about the type of a Passenger Queue. Values can be: Pre-Check, Private, Economy, Priority, KnownCrewMember.

Code.description: Property. Unique code for the type of Passenger Queue.

Description.description: Property. Description of the type of Passenger Queue.
